paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: BRCA2 mutations are associated with hereditary prostate cancer.

variants.additional_notes: The relation of PD-L1 expression with the BRCA status was unclear for most of the cases.
key_quotes: Combining the scant analyzable data, aberrations in BRCA1/2 genes were found in 15/39 (39%) cases.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant related to BRCA2 was found in the text.
